descriptions: Introducing the LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector with 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector. Designed specifically for the Google Pixel 8, this screen protector and camera lens protector combo offers all-round protection for your device. Made from 9H super strong military explosion-proof glass, the screen protector ensures that every corner of your screen is protected, while the camera lens protector keeps your camera safe from scratches and high impact drops. With its ultra-thin design, the screen protector maintains the original visual experience and high-definition image quality. Plus, the high-response haptic touch technology provides a seamless and bare screen-like feel during use. The package includes 2 screen protectors, 2 camera lens protectors, and full installation accessories. Trust LK for a compatible and cost-effective solution. Contact us for lifetime service and excellent customer support.

Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.
